title: The Known Lands
body: Northern lands and Inditt region were two different tectonic plates which joined, creating the Vovosian range and the Golian Ridge. The northern realm's plate was made of a grey stone, whilst the inditt region was of sandstone/orange stone, which is why there is the contrast betwene the two
preface: The Known Lands is the name to the entire geographical region where the events of the Heruvian Saga takes place.
